brand_identity.visual_style: Noir Architecture, Matte Textures, Editorial Grid, Golden Hour

typography.rules: Never use bold weights > 600. Use italics for emphasis in headings to create an 'editorial' voice.

colors.gradients: No gradients. Use solid matte colors or subtle noise textures.

spacing.scale: 2x standard. Use p-12, p-24, p-32 for section padding.

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid (Asymmetric). Never equal columns. Use col-span-4 vs col-span-8.
layout_strategies.hero_section: Full viewport height (100vh). Image dominates. Text is minimal and anchored bottom-left or centered-fade.
layout_strategies.property_list: Masonry or Staggered Grid. Images aspect ratio: 4:5 or 16:9 mixed.
layout_strategies.navigation: Minimal floating header. Background blur-md. Logo left, Menu right (text or hamburger).
layout_strategies.footer: Massive padding (py-32). Simple columns. Large contact CTA.

page_load.effect: Soft fade-in from black. Text rises 10px.

hover_states.buttons: Fill effect or Underline slide. No bounce.

buttons.style: Outline or Ghost. Thin borders (1px). Uppercase text. Tracking-widest.
buttons.interaction: Solid fill on hover. Transition duration 500ms.

cards.style: Image-first. Text below image. Minimal metadata (Price, Location).

forms.style: Minimal. Bottom border only. No background. Large text inputs.

images.treatment: Desaturate slightly (80%). Full saturation on hover. Add noise overlay if possible.

implementation_steps: Install dependencies: framer-motion, @studio-freight/lenis (or lenis/react), clsx, tailwind-merge
Update tailwind.config.js with 'midnight', 'champagne', 'stone' colors and font families.
Add Google Fonts link to public/index.html head.
Create global 'SmoothScroll' wrapper component using Lenis.
Build 'Layout' component with persistent Navigation and Footer.
Develop 'PropertyCard' and 'Hero' components using the defined motion guidelines.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio > 4.5:1 for text. Use Aria labels for icon buttons.
universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines.code_style: Functional components. Typed props (if TS, else PropTypes). Modular CSS/Tailwind.
